reviewText: I thought it was ok but not great. Actually a bit disappointed. I will list this for resale soon
Doesn't play on a Windows computer, Macintosh only.
Presents card weaving on a inkle loom, so if you are not a inkle loom owner, don't bother. Also won't play on a Windows operating system.
I would recommend this to every inkle weaver. You learn a lot, even more than you think, and I like John Mullarkey's work
I like his weaving techniques, and my sisters told me they were great dvd's and taught you a lot any it was very interesting

This got me started weaving but it seems this, like a lot of resources on tablet-weaving, are missing something.

I'd like to see more on pattern-making, on some border styles and warping when you aren't using an inkle loom.

This is a wonderful DVD that will teach any beginner how to get started tablet weaving.  John is a very good teacher.  Tablet weaving is a fun, easy, portable, inexpensive way to get started weaving.  This DVD will help you!
John is a wonderful teacher.  This is a great DVD that can teach anyone to tablet weave.
